Text:
Good job. The subtitles are not in English, but in another language I can't recognize.
If you need English subs, try here:
http://subscene.com/tess/subtitles-35510.aspx
Tess.1979.DVDRip.XviD-UnSeeN (Tess.1979.DVDRip.XviD-UnSeeN )
and adjust time with subrip: 1st part -15,250s
2nd part -1h22mn50,081s

Thanks for this rare and good movie.
V 9
A 9
The subtitles are in Romanian

There's not much chance that signalboy will read this after such a long time, but PAL is faster than NTSC. By exactly 4% ;-) (25 instead of 24 fps).

You have to consider this when you compare runtimes.

A better set of Eng subtitles are here: http://www.opensubtitles.org/en/subtitles/3148370/tess-en

No need to adjust the time or anything like that. Works perfectly fine.
Thank you for posting this fine film, cristi_drag and thank you shiningwiz, for suggesting the better subtitles. Much appreciated.
